person.persName: James L. Arnold (Nicholas Co, KY, farmer and clerk)

body.p: Nicholas County, Kentucky, farmer and clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Lewis H. Arnold. Married to Mary Ann Tureman Arnold in Nicholas County on January 11, 1842. Father of Virginia M. Arnold, Ann Elizabeth Arnold, Mary Arnold, and Joseph W. Arnold. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Household owned five additional enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1850. Farmer in Nicholas County in 1860. Owned nine enslaved persons in Nicholas County in 1860. Clerk in Nicholas County in 1863.
